biocontainers.name: ramid
biocontainers.summary: R-program to read CDF files created by mass spectrometry and evaluate the MS 13C-labeled metabolites

biotools.summary: R-program supporting the initial step of the workflow of 13C assisted fluxomic analysis: extraction of mass spectra (MS) of 13C-labeled metabolites of interest from raw mass spectrometer recordings saved in NetCDF files.

bioschemas.name: Ramid
bioschemas.summary: R-program supporting the initial step of the workflow of 13C assisted fluxomic analysis: extraction of mass spectra (MS) of 13C-labeled metabolites of interest from raw mass spectrometer recordings saved in NetCDF files.
